briefTitle: Randomized, Double-blind (db), Placebo-controlled 18 Week Study of Linagliptin (BI 1356) in Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Insufficient Glycaemic Control on a Sulfonylurea Drug
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled Parallel Group Efficacy and Safety Study of BI 1356 (5 mg Administered Orally Once Daily) Over 18 Weeks in Type 2 Diabetic Patients With Insufficient Glycaemic Control (HbA1c 7.0-10%) Despite Background Therapy With a Sulfonylurea Drug.
summary: Efficacy and safety of BI 1356 compared to placebo in patients with type 2 diabetes who have insufficient glycaemic control despite treatment with a sulfonylurea drug.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in HbA1c (Glycosylated Hemoglobin) at Week 18
